title: Monday Post Show (3-15-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (3-15-21)
description:
Bobby wonders if the time change is affecting him today? He says it usually doesn’t hit him. Bobby says the good things is that now he can play golf in the evening. Bobby also talks about the possibility of playing in a Pro Am tournament. Bobby texted Dan + Shay yesterday about winning a Grammy. They just texted him back. Mike D gives a review of Paramount+ and Amy talks about watching the Paris Hilton documentary.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
